func.title: Find_AtPoint

param.name: x
param.desc: X coordinate of the starting point. Relative to the calling object's center in local calls.

param.name: y
param.desc: Y coordinate of the starting point. Relative to the calling object's center in local calls.

func.desc: Search criterion: finds all objects which overlap the specified coordinate point.
func.remark: For additional information on the use of this function see FindObjects.
